nodes.text: Clink was an LE-series droid owned by a Gran trader on Pantora. Along with the astromech droids 225 and DK-3, Clink was supervised by the protocol droid CG-67. Shortly after the end of the Clone Wars, Echo—having encountered Clink and the other droids after being sold to a trader by his comrade Hunter after the trader believed a disguised Echo was a droid himself—removed the droids' restraining bolts, tasking them with the repair of their starship, Havoc Marauder. Though Clink attempted to take charge, CG-67 asserted her authority. When the Marauder was repaired, Echo thanked Clink and the other droids, returning them to CG-67's care.
Clink first appeared in "Cornered," the fourth episode of the series Star Wars: The Bad Batch, released on Disney+ on May 21, 2021.
